item.title: Delivery Platform
item.description: The Project In my Enginerring 107 class for my final project I was supposed to create a platform that carries 2.5kg package from the drone delivered location to the front of door step. Scenario You work at a recently amalgamated company, Acme Paper Science Corporation (APSC), now the largest manufacturer of paper products on the US East Coast. You are a design engineer of the newly established Research and Development (R&D) Group tasked with developing a range of new paper products to address the needs of a rapidly developing drone delivery market segment.
